f8_spec.label: PyEngine
f8_spec.description: Python-based execution engine for Feel8 operators.

stateFields.name: dataDelivery
stateFields.label: Data Delivery
stateFields.description: How data inputs are delivered to nodes: pull (default), push, or both.

stateFields.name: active
stateFields.label: Active
stateFields.description: Service lifecycle state (activate/deactivate).

stateFields.name: svcId
stateFields.label: Service Id
stateFields.description: Readonly: current service instance id (svcId).

f8_spec.label: UDP Skeleton
f8_spec.description: Receives UDP packets and keeps latest skeleton per model key, with TTL cleanup and selection.

stateFields.name: bindAddress
stateFields.label: Bind Address
stateFields.description: Local address to bind (loopback by default).

stateFields.name: allowNonLoopbackBind
stateFields.label: Allow Non-loopback Bind
stateFields.description: When true, allow bindAddress values other than loopback.

stateFields.name: port
stateFields.label: Port
stateFields.description: UDP listen port.

stateFields.name: maxQueue
stateFields.label: Max Queue
stateFields.description: Max queued packets before dropping (1..4096).

stateFields.name: reuseAddress
stateFields.label: Reuse Address
stateFields.description: Best-effort: allow multiple listeners on same (address, port) if OS supports.

stateFields.name: cleanupAfterMs
stateFields.label: Cleanup After (ms)
stateFields.description: Remove models that haven't updated for this many ms (<=0 disables cleanup).

stateFields.name: selectedKey
stateFields.label: Selected Key
stateFields.description: If set and matches an available key, outputs `selectedSkeleton`; otherwise None.

stateFields.name: availableKeys
stateFields.label: Available Keys
stateFields.description: Read-only list of current keys (updated only on changes).

stateFields.name: svcId
stateFields.label: Service Id
stateFields.description: Readonly: current service instance id (svcId).

stateFields.name: operatorId
stateFields.label: Operator Id
stateFields.description: Readonly: current operator/node id (operatorId).

dataOutPorts.name: skeletons
dataOutPorts.description: List of latest payloads (ordered by key).

f8_spec.label: Python Script
f8_spec.description: Execute Python code with onStart/onState/onMsg/onExec/onStop hooks.

stateFields.name: code
stateFields.label: Code
stateFields.description: Python source code defining onStart(ctx), onMsg(ctx, inputs), onStop(ctx).

valueSchema.default:
# Define hooks (any subset is ok):
# - onStart(ctx)
# - onState(ctx, field, value, tsMs=None)      # called on state updates (except 'code')
# - onMsg(ctx, inputs)                        # called on data arrival (push mode) or as fallback for exec
# - onExec(ctx, execIn, inputs)               # called on exec trigger (pull mode)
# - onStop(ctx)
# - ctx['state'] is preserved between calls
# - ctx['execIn'] is set for exec-triggered calls
# - State helpers:
#   - await ctx['get_state'](field)           # read state value
#   - ctx['set_state'](field, value)          # write state (fire-and-forget)
#   - await ctx['set_state_async'](field, value)
#   Note: for best UI/graph support, add the target state fields on the node (editableStateFields=True).
# - inputs is a dict keyed by input port names
# Return value protocol:
# - onMsg: return {'outputs': {...}} or any value (emits to 'out' if present)
# - onExec: return {'exec': ['exec','exec2'], 'outputs': {...}}
#   - 'exec' selects exec out port(s) to trigger (defaults to pass-through)
#   - 'outputs' is a dict mapping dataOutPort -> value

def onStart(ctx):
    ctx['log']('python_script started')

def onState(ctx, field, value, tsMs=None):
    # Example: react to a state change.
    # ctx['log'](f'state {field}={value} tsMs={tsMs}')
    return

def onMsg(ctx, inputs):
    msg = inputs.get('msg')
    return {'outputs': {'out': msg}}

def onExec(ctx, execIn, inputs):
    # Example: choose different exec outputs by execIn port name.
    if execIn == 'exec2':
        return {'exec': ['exec2'], 'outputs': {'out': inputs.get('msg')}}
    return {'exec': ['exec'], 'outputs': {'out': inputs.get('msg')}}

def onStop(ctx):
    ctx['log']('python_script stopped')

stateFields.name: lastError
stateFields.label: Last Error
stateFields.description: Last script error (compile/runtime).

stateFields.name: svcId
stateFields.label: Service Id
stateFields.description: Readonly: current service instance id (svcId).

stateFields.label: Operator Id
stateFields.description: Readonly: current operator/node id (operatorId).

f8_spec.label: Tick
f8_spec.description: Source operator that generates periodic exec ticks.

stateFields.name: tickMs
stateFields.label: Tick (ms)
stateFields.description: Interval in milliseconds for emitting exec ticks.

stateFields.name: hiResTimer
stateFields.label: High-res Timer (Windows)
stateFields.description: Request 1ms system timer resolution to reduce jitter on Windows.

stateFields.name: svcId
stateFields.label: Service Id
stateFields.description: Readonly: current service instance id (svcId).

stateFields.name: operatorId
stateFields.label: Operator Id
stateFields.description: Readonly: current operator/node id (operatorId).

dataOutPorts.name: processingMs
dataOutPorts.description: Per-tick processing time in milliseconds (excluding sleep).

dataOutPorts.name: intervalMs
dataOutPorts.description: Actual interval between tick starts in milliseconds.

dataOutPorts.name: latenessMs
dataOutPorts.description: How late this tick started relative to its scheduled deadline (ms).

f8_spec.label: Envelope
f8_spec.description: Tracks upper/lower envelopes and emits a normalized value (0..1).

stateFields.name: method
stateFields.label: Method
stateFields.description: Envelope filter method.

stateFields.name: rise_alpha
stateFields.label: Rise Alpha
stateFields.description: Smoothing factor when moving toward the envelope.

stateFields.name: fall_alpha
stateFields.label: Fall Alpha
stateFields.description: Smoothing factor when moving away from the envelope.

stateFields.name: min_span
stateFields.label: Min Span
stateFields.description: Minimum enforced envelope span.

stateFields.name: sma_window
stateFields.label: SMA Window
stateFields.description: Window size for SMA mode.

stateFields.name: margin
stateFields.label: Margin
stateFields.description: Extra margin added to envelopes before normalization.

stateFields.name: jumpEnabled
stateFields.label: Jump Enabled
stateFields.description: Enable consecutive-frame jump detection and reseed.

stateFields.name: jumpSpanMult
stateFields.label: Jump Span Mult
stateFields.description: Distance threshold in envelope-span units for jump detection.

stateFields.name: jumpConsecutiveFrames
stateFields.label: Jump Frames
stateFields.description: Consecutive far frames required before jump trigger.

stateFields.name: jumpReseedFrames
stateFields.label: Reseed Frames
stateFields.description: Blend length (frames) after jump reset.

stateFields.name: jumpResetConfidence
stateFields.label: Jump Reset Confidence
stateFields.description: Reset confidence history when jump reset is triggered.

stateFields.name: confidenceEnabled
stateFields.label: Confidence Enabled
stateFields.description: Enable periodicity confidence estimation.

stateFields.name: confidenceWindow
stateFields.label: Confidence Window
stateFields.description: Sliding window size for autocorrelation confidence.

stateFields.name: confidenceMinLag
stateFields.label: Confidence Min Lag
stateFields.description: Minimum lag used in autocorrelation scan.

stateFields.name: confidenceMaxLag
stateFields.label: Confidence Max Lag
stateFields.description: Maximum lag used in autocorrelation scan.

stateFields.name: confidencePeakProminence
stateFields.label: Peak Prominence
stateFields.description: Minimum local prominence for valid autocorrelation peaks.

stateFields.name: confidenceMinPeaks
stateFields.label: Min Peaks
stateFields.description: Minimum valid autocorrelation peaks before full confidence.

stateFields.name: confidenceSmoothingAlpha
stateFields.label: Conf Smooth Alpha
stateFields.description: EMA smoothing factor for confidence output.

stateFields.name: confidenceNoiseFloor
stateFields.label: Noise Floor
stateFields.description: Minimum energy needed before periodicity confidence can rise.

stateFields.name: confidenceResetOnMissing
stateFields.label: Conf Reset On Missing
stateFields.description: Decay confidence when input is missing.

stateFields.name: svcId
stateFields.label: Service Id
stateFields.description: Readonly: current service instance id (svcId).

stateFields.name: operatorId
stateFields.label: Operator Id
stateFields.description: Readonly: current operator/node id (operatorId).

stateFields.description: Readonly: current operator/node id (operatorId).

dataInPorts.name: intervalMs
